divs: Sighting Detailsam at street level. opened the door and scanned sky with unaided eye as usual when I exit house in dark hours. saw a bright light unmoving for approximately 10 minutes. entered house and wrote this and at 0122 exited again and took pictures and entered house at 0123.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Hamburg
There were no other sightings in Hamburg on or around August 12th 2011
Summary: bright light.my arm at 120 Deg. angle toward it.
